definition: Control: Public, Private nonprofit, or Private for-profit
Proportion of students receiving Pell Grants (low-income proxy)
Average net price for Pell-eligible families (income <$48K); computed as mean of $0–30K and $30–48K brackets per FSA 2025–26 guidelines
8-year completion rate for Pell Grant recipients
8-year completion rate for students with no Pell and no loans (wealthy proxy)
Completion gap: completion_wealthy minus completion_pell; positive = wealthy students complete at higher rates
Median earnings 10 years after entry (federal aid recipients)
Median federal loan debt at graduation
